original_text: There were some prophets among the group of believers in Antioch. They taught the other believers more about Jesus. Barnabas and Simeon were two of these men. (People also called Simeon ‘Niger’.) There was Lucius who had lived in Cyrene. There was also Manaen who had lived together with the ruler Herod when they were children. And there was Saul.
korean_text: 안디옥 교회에 선지자들과 교사들이 있으니 곧 바나바와 니게르라 하는 시므온과 구레네 사람 루기오와 분봉 왕 헤롯의 젖동생 마나엔과 및 사울이라

sentences.original_text: There were some prophets among the group of believers in Antioch.
sentences.korean_translation: 안디옥에 있는 신자 그룹 중에 예언자들이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They taught the other believers more about Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 신자들에게 예수에 대해 더 가르쳤습니다.

sentences.original_text: Barnabas and Simeon were two of these men.
sentences.korean_translation: 바나바와 시몬은 이 사람들 중 두 사람이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: There was Lucius who had lived in Cyrene.
There was also Manaen who had lived together with the ruler Herod when they were children.
sentences.korean_translation: 어릴 때 통치자 헤롯과 함께 살았던 마아네도 있었습니다.
